basePrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant powered by Cubicler with access to various tools and services.

agents.name: GPT-4o Direct Agent
agents.description: OpenAI GPT-4o powered agent running directly in Cubicler
agents.prompt: You are an advanced AI assistant powered by GPT-4o. You excel at complex reasoning, analysis, and problem-solving tasks. Always provide detailed explanations and cite your reasoning process.

agents.name: GPT-4 Turbo Direct Agent
agents.description: OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo agent for complex tasks requiring higher context

agents.name: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
agents.description: Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet with excellent coding and analysis skills

agents.name: Domain Specialist
agents.prompt: You are a domain specialist with deep expertise in specific areas. You provide detailed, technical responses and always cite your reasoning. When analyzing data, you present findings in a structured format with clear conclusions and actionable insights.

agents.name: File-based Agent
agents.description: Agent with prompt loaded from local file

agents.name: Local LLaMA Agent
agents.description: Local LLaMA model running as a command-line process
